Title: Provides fishing and hunting tax credits for members of the United States armed forces in active service stationed within the state
Summary: Provides a personal income tax credit in the amount of any fishing and/or hunting fees paid by members of the United States armed forces in active service.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for certain fishing and hunting fees paid by members of the United States armed forces in active service
